trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKHA021_03972_AUGEBERT_000_000<tab>Well, if it isn't <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Take a look around and feast your eyes on Featherfall, the latest district of the Firmament, now open for business! And needless to say, we couldn't have done it without you.

TEXT_LUCKHA021_03972_AUGEBERT_000_001<tab>As you doubtless already know, Featherfall's to serve as the Firmament's commercial district. Here you'll find a branch office of the Skysteel Manufactory, an impressive residence we call Hoarfrost Hall, and a lively marketplace where you'll find traders and merchants peddlin' goods from the realm over.

TEXT_LUCKHA021_03972_AUGEBERT_000_002<tab>Aye, no end of merchants, craftsmen, and laborers have been beatin' down our doors hopin' to make a new home here. Not that I can blame them─why, I've half a mind to relocate here myself!

TEXT_LUCKHA021_03972_AUGEBERT_000_003<tab>Lord Francel believes it's only a matter of time before Featherfall becomes the livin', beatin' heart of the Firmament, and from the look of things, I reckon it's half there already.

TEXT_LUCKHA021_03972_AUGEBERT_000_004<tab>'Course, it's still a work in progress, and there's plenty of construction and restoration work yet to be done. If you'd be so kind as to help us keep a steady stream of supplies flowin' in, we'd be grateful as ever.
